channel.title: Illustration – Matthew Gordils
channel.description: Designer, Illustrator, and front end developer

item.title: Totally Organic
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
Totally Organic is a orange juice packaging created for Trader Joes. The juice comes in a carton or a frozen concentrate. For the look of the packaging I played off of botanical drawings and retro fruit patterns.

The post Totally Organic appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
Totally Organic is a orange juice packaging created for Trader Joes. The juice comes in a carton or a frozen concentrate. For the look of the packaging I played off of botanical drawings and retro fruit patterns.

The post Totally Organic appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
